Entries.Abigail: #$c .5#I love the way the valley looks in the rain. It makes everything feel so romantic...#I don't mind getting a little wet on days like today. Sometimes it's fun getting caught in the rain.

Entries.SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: So you think it's perfectly acceptable to rummage through someone's underpants? Come on @, close the drawer already... it's getting weird.$u
Abigail's underpants drawer. There's a purple mineral tucked among her things.
